from django.forms import ModelForm, CharField
from django.contrib.auth.models import User
from teamhub.models import Projekt, Aufgabe

'''
Django forms go here
'''



[Doku]class profilForm(ModelForm):

[Doku]    class Meta:
        model = User
        fields = ('username', 'first_name', 'last_name', 'email')




[Doku]class projektForm(ModelForm):

[Doku]    class Meta:
        model = Projekt




[Doku]class projektFormErstellen(ModelForm):

[Doku]    class Meta:
        model = Projekt
        exclude = ('status',)




[Doku]class aufgabeForm(ModelForm):

[Doku]    class Meta:
        model = Aufgabe




[Doku]class aufgabeErstellenForm(ModelForm):

[Doku]    class Meta:
        model = Aufgabe
        exclude = ('ersteller', 'status',)




[Doku]class userForm(ModelForm):

[Doku]    class Meta:
        model = User
        fields=('username','is_staff')
